job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>We are looking for a machine learning engineer with a mastery of AWS (training and deploying models, lambdas and endpoints).</p><p><br></p><p>To succeed in this role, you should possess outstanding skills in machine learning methods and statistics.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p><ul><li>Create, implement, and train machine learning models</li><li>Clean and structure data</li><li>Create and test hypotheses</li><li>Train the developed models to run evaluative experiments to refine models and increase accuracy</li><li>Remain updated in the rapidly changing field of machine learning</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Requirements</strong></p><ul><li>Strong command of structured and unstructured data preparation</li><li>Master/commander of Python</li><li>Mastery of AWS</li><li>Experience in relational and non-relational databases (eg. dynamoDB, mySQL)</li><li>Degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Computational Linguistics or similar field</li><li>At least 2 years of experience in a <strong>non-academic</strong> production role.</li><li>The ability to meet agreed upon deadlines and responsibilities.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Desirable</strong></p><ul><li>An analytical mind with problem-solving abilities</li><li>Strong communication skills</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Interview Process:</strong></p><p>1. Google meet interview (10-15 min.)</p><p>2. check your references</p><p>3. take-home project (1hr)</p><p>3. Google Meet interview (20-30min.)</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Compensation:</strong></p><p>Job Type: Full-time</p><p>Pay: $90,000.00 - $150,000.00 per year</p>
